channel.title: Crius | 21 Working Skills | Boss Pets | Perfect Switching | Gambling |
channel.description:
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/hq4yzl0kju78git/Crius.jar?dl=1"]Download:[/URL]
[URL=http://"https://www.dropbox.com/s/hq4yzl0kju78git/Crius.jar?dl=1"]Play Now:[/URL]
Welcome to Crius! It is back & better than ever! The server's owners are Test
[img]http://i.imgur.com/SQ6XhRv.png[/img]
- PVP COMBAT - • Perfect clipped following. • Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic. • Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players. • Working curse prayers, and regular prayers. • PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop. • Uncheatable PvP point system. • Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild. • Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds. • Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc. • Fully working curses with correct effects. • Instant switching. • Vengeance. • Ring of recoil.
- PVM COMBAT - • Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs. • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs. • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs. • Npcs don't walk on top of one another. • Can't diagnal fight or stand on Npc. • Multi barrage.
- BOSSES & MONSTERS - • King Black dragon • Dagannoth kings • Chaos elemental • Kalphite queen • Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon • Nex • Donator boss • Nomad • Barrelchest • Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation • Corperal beast • Bork • Tormented demons • Revenants • Unholy cursebearer • Strykewyrms • Frost dragons • Chaos tunnels • Mithril dragons • Slayer dungeon • Ranged & Mage training dungeon. • Primal Warriors • Rammernaut (Primal weapons boss)
- MINIGAMES - • Fight caves • Fight pits • Duel arena • Pest control • Barrows • Fun pk • Barbarian Defence • Spirit warriors • Champions challenge • Recipe for Disaster
- SKILLING - • Skillcapes. • Max cape and Completionist Cape! • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks. • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, Extreme flasks, and super prayer potions. • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling. • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well. • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop. • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out. • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back. • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations. • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations. • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash. • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches. • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.
The server is VPS Hosted and is online 24/7.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/VRfJrCj.png[/img]
Fully working Dice: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/a9a25523e70e4c91b114ae9fa7454b3d.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/02d12a009cb4e5d055fb5a26c63256cd.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7dc5a4d8899f64e3552eb929aa9094ee.png[/img]
Primal Warriors ( Wildy ): [img]http://i.gyazo.com/84eaf777984cb928de8b2e3fd0d11bb0.png[/img]

Random Pictures: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5ca5364c0c2b88c34fa4cb2d6accbee6.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0080fd0a6c21aeddb0758062bc16d4d9.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0cd9188ee0c8e0cc9ca16440abf241c7.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/25e33532a83e33d5fad7ddff8f23c28a.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/13ac6ea0da3e322b118ec662f2cd4c47.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ca9bee66eac4a0f5d8b6f478b4b9189e.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/46706ff3f4e56c624dc71e8a9ecc4211.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/2fbc3d16504ec6e0cfbacf724479f5d5.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/05c35d4c860ed0345989a55d1ea2f462.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/b04197f823592e92821f100713887caa.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/61441ec0ab08940baff8795a24c35c0b.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/f9dae908148d360fa32830fd6bbb70f3.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/6b5539ef3c8255db6f3eb1a164457511.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/5830a26fd5662538d60e4ccd49b6ca13.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/12492c97bde4fc3d34e88eaae75c8e9e.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/c3974f1b71e32fedf5168f0f7a491999.png[/img]
Thok's Sword: [img]http://gyazo.com/ee7183f9b964f5532fae1445d1434ad2.png[/img]

item.title: Crius | 21 Working Skills | Boss Pets | Perfect Switching | Gambling |
item.dc:creator: @Nerdypker123 Nerdypker123
item.description:
@Nerdypker123 wrote:

[font=georgia][size=12pt]So first off, you should fix the media, not all of the pictures are loading. Next, fix the links, they work, but not if you don’t know to delete part of the URL. So that would help if you fixed it. Now, the server isn’t super original. Doesn’t have an original feel to it at all. It is an older version, but not original. There’s nothing that you’ve done to it to separate it from other servers, other than make the home in the slayer tower, which is weird. Because of the home being there, it’s not easy to navigate. It took me about 4 minutes just to find the MOM. I’m not saying it’s not a good server, it could be if you fixed and added a lot more, but as of right now, 2 out of 5 MOMs.[/size][/font]

MOM is Make Over Mage, for anyone who doesn’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Crius | 21 Working Skills | Boss Pets | Perfect Switching | Gambling |
item.dc:creator: @Crius Crius
item.description:
@Crius wrote:

Download:

Play Now:

Welcome to Crius! It is back & better than ever! The server’s owners are Test

  • PVP COMBAT -
    • Perfect clipped following.
    • Clipped projectiles for both ranged and magic.
    • Perfect max hit, and attack/defense formulas.
    • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs players.
    • Working curse prayers, and regular prayers.
    • PvP point shops that requires kills to unlock new items. Every kill you get unlocks a new item in the shop.
    • Uncheatable PvP point system.
    • Chance of a PvP item drop when killing other players in the wild.
    • Perfect animations, hit delays, weapon speeds.
    • Correct item effects, spirit sheilds, DFS, barrows, slayer helm etc.
    • Fully working curses with correct effects.
    • Instant switching.
    • Vengeance.
    • Ring of recoil.

  • PVM COMBAT -
    • Perfect clipped following, and walking for NPCs.
    • Perfect attack styles, and emotes for all NPCs.
    • All specials working with correct effects for all weapons vs npcs.
    • Npcs don’t walk on top of one another.
    • Can’t diagnal fight or stand on Npc.
    • Multi barrage.

  • BOSSES & MONSTERS -
    • King Black dragon
    • Dagannoth kings
    • Chaos elemental
    • Kalphite queen
    • Godwars Bosses & minions in the Godwars dungeon
    • Nex
    • Donator boss
    • Nomad
    • Barrelchest
    • Decaying Avatar, Avatar of Destruction, Avatar of Creation
    • Corperal beast
    • Bork
    • Tormented demons
    • Revenants
    • Unholy cursebearer
    • Strykewyrms
    • Frost dragons
    • Chaos tunnels
    • Mithril dragons
    • Slayer dungeon
    • Ranged & Mage training dungeon.
    • Primal Warriors
    • Rammernaut (Primal weapons boss)

  • MINIGAMES -
    • Fight caves
    • Fight pits
    • Duel arena
    • Pest control
    • Barrows
    • Fun pk
    • Barbarian Defence
    • Spirit warriors
    • Champions challenge
    • Recipe for Disaster

  • SKILLING -
    • Skillcapes.
    • Max cape and Completionist Cape!
    • Perfect slayer & slayer tasks. All monsters in the server are able to be assigned as slayer tasks.
    • Working herblore skill. You are able to clean herbs, and also make extreme potions, recover special, Extreme flasks, and super prayer potions.
    • Working mining skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working mining & smithing skill. Mine ores with correct delays & rock emptying/refilling.
    • Working fishing & cooking skills. You can fish all types of fish including rocktails, and cooking them as well.
    • Working agility skill with gnome agility course with correct delays, and animations with agility ticket rewards shop.
    • Working firemaking skill integrated with the clipping system, with global ashes dropping after fire burns out.
    • Working woodcutting skill with trees being chopped down to stumps, and spawning back.
    • Working fletching skill with interfaces, make longbows, short bows, arrows with animations.
    • Working crafting skill with interfaces, and animations.
    • Working Thieving skill. Thieving stalls at home that give good amounts of cash.
    • Working runecrafting skill with multipliers, pure essesnce and pouches.
    • Working farming skill. You can plant seeds, and pick herbs.

The server is VPS Hosted and is online 24/7.
